CustomField.formula:
IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK(Price__c)), IF( OR( Subscription_License_Term_Months__c = 0, ISPICKVAL( Billing_Frequency__c ,'One Time Event')),0, IF( ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c,'Annually'),((Price__c* Number_of_Licensed_Named_Users__c )/ 12), IF( ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c,'Quarterly'), ((Price__c* Number_of_Licensed_Named_Users__c )/ 3) ,Price__c* Number_of_Licensed_Named_Users__c ))),
If ( Or ( Subscription_License_Term_Months__c = 0, ISPICKVAL( Commitment_Reoccurence__c ,'month')),0, If ( ISPICKVAL(Commitment_Reoccurence__c ,'year'),(( Committed_Rate__c * Committed_Minutes__c )/ 12), If ( ISPICKVAL(Commitment_Reoccurence__c ,'quarter'), ((Committed_Rate__c * Committed_Minutes__c )/ 3) ,Committed_Rate__c * Committed_Minutes__c ) ) ))
CustomField.label: MRR
